New Records: Ketel Marte broke the postseason hitting streak record with a two-run single in Game 2, pushing his streak to 18 games and the longest in postseason history at 20 games
Key Match Events: Seager and Semien each homered early in an 11-7 rout of the Arizona Diamondbacks in Game 4
Arizona's sterling defense stumbled at the worst time in Game 4, opening the door for a second straight five-run inning by Texas
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers are favorites to win the World Series at -1700 odds, according to FanDuel Sportsbook
Rangers slugger Adolis García and pitcher Max Scherzer will miss the rest of the World Series after getting hurt in Game 3
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Seager joins Hall of Fame company with 2023 World Series MVP award
‘You inspired me': Bruce Bochy hails Rangers' players after World Series win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The World Series will be broadcast on Fox and Fox Deportes, with the first pitch for all games set at 7:03 p.m.
Game 5: Wednesday, Nov. 1 at Arizona, 7:03 p.m.
Game 6: Friday, Nov. 3 at Texas, 7:03 p.m. (if necessary)
Game 7: Saturday, Nov. 4 at Texas, 7:03 p.m. (if necessary)
Others: The Rangers improved to 10-0 on the road this postseason and moved within one win of the first title in the 63-season history of a franchise that started as the expansion Washington Senators
